data.actual_result: Image gets stuck mid-way through the screen
data.expected_result: The image would either swipe back up covering the full screen or swipe down showing regular chat
data.short_description: Image gets stuck if held there until fully loaded
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap on an unloaded image - Swipe partially down so that the image is still showing and loading but not taking up the full screen - Hold it there until it loads 100% - Let go of the screen
